question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/mvhashmap/src/versioned_data.rs] [Function: fetch_data_and_record_dependency()] [Dependency recording] If v.read() succeeds but dependency recording fails internally, does fetch_data_and_record_dependency() (line 535-548) properly propagate errors or return success incorrectly?
